title: Insight into heavy metal chemical fractions in ash collected from municipal and industrial waste incinerators in northern Vietnam
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16486-16500
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01465K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thi Thu Thuy Nguyen, Truong Xuan Vuong, Thi Thu Ha Pham, Quoc Anh Hoang, Binh Minh Tu, Thi Hue Nguyen, Thi Thu Phuong Nguyen
This study collected fly ash and bottom ash from seven incinerators in northern Vietnam to analyze the distribution of heavy metals (Pb, Cr, As, Cd, Cu, Zn) in the waste ash.
